headline.seo: Obama, at Caterpillar Plant, Lobbies for Stimulus Package
headline.main: Obama Takes His Lobbying for Stimulus to Illinois
headline.print_headline: Obama Takes His Lobbying For Stimulus To Illinois

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama brought his economic recovery road show to East Peoria, Ill., telling workers at a plant there that the recovery effort could bring back some of their jobs.
docs.snippet: President Obama brought his economic recovery road show to East Peoria, Ill., telling workers at a plant there that the recovery effort could bring back some of their jobs....

headline.main: House Passes Stimulus Plan With No G.O.P. Votes
headline.print_headline: HOUSE APPROVES $819 BILLION PLAN FOR ECONOMIC AID

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama won House approval for an $819 billion economic plan without a single vote from Republicans as Democrats sought to temper their own differences.
docs.snippet: President Obama won House approval for an $819 billion economic plan without a single vote from Republicans as Democrats sought to temper their own differences....

headline.main: President Obama Punishes Russia, at Last
headline.print_headline: Mr. Obama Punishes Russia, at Last

docs.lead_paragraph: No, Mr. Trump, Americans are not going to forget about Russian hacking.
docs.snippet: No, Mr. Trump, Americans are not going to forget about Russian hacking....

headline.main: LGBT Activists View Obama as Staunch Champion of Their Cause
headline.print_headline: LGBT Activists View Obama as Staunch Champion of Their Cause

docs.lead_paragraph: It was a new look for the White House, bathed in rainbow colors to celebrate the Supreme Court decision allowing same-sex marriage nationwide.
docs.snippet: It was a new look for the White House, bathed in rainbow colors to celebrate the Supreme Court decision allowing same-sex marriage nationwide....

headline.main: Thousands Brave Cold for Tickets to Obama Farewell Speech
headline.print_headline: Thousands Brave Cold for Tickets to Obama Farewell Speech

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of people waited for hours in single-digit temperatures on Saturday to try to get a ticket to President Barack Obama's farewell speech in his hometown of Chicago, saying they want to show their appreciation and soak in the final moments of his history-making presidency.
docs.snippet: Thousands of people waited for hours in single-digit temperatures on Saturday to try to get a ticket to President Barack Obama's farewell speech in his hometown of Chicago, saying they want to show their appreciation and soak in the final moments ...

headline.main: Imprisoned Blagojevich Awaits Obama Decision on Commutation
headline.print_headline: Imprisoned Blagojevich Awaits Obama Decision on Commutation

docs.lead_paragraph: One of the last chances for former Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich to win early release from federal prison rests on a pending decision by the man whose Senate seat Blagojevich was convicted of trying to sell — President Barack Obama.
docs.snippet: One of the last chances for former Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich to win early release from federal prison rests on a pending decision by the man whose Senate seat Blagojevich was convicted of trying to sell — President Barack Obama....

headline.main: Obama Derides 'Reckless' Plan to Repeal Now, Replace Later
headline.print_headline: Obama Derides 'Reckless' Plan to Repeal Now, Replace Later

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama derided as "reckless" on Friday a Republican plan to repeal his health care law now and replace it later, predicting that the replacement may never come.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama derided as "reckless" on Friday a Republican plan to repeal his health care law now and replace it later, predicting that the replacement may never come....

headline.main: Kerry Rebukes Israel, Calling Settlements a Threat to Peace
headline.print_headline: Kerry Says Israel Keeps Sabotaging Peace Prospects

byline.contributor: Peter Baker contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Michael D. Shear from West Palm Beach, Fla.

docs.abstract: Sec of State John Kerry gives extraordinarily blunt speech largely blaming ongoing conflict between Israel and Palestine on Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu; cites need to protect one of America's longest and closest allies from extreme elements in its own political culture; warns Netanyahu's continued support for West Bank settlements makes two-state solution increasingly impossible.
docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry argued that Israel could not survive as both a Jewish state and a democratic state unless it embraced a two-state plan.
docs.snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry argued that Israel could not survive as both a Jewish state and a democratic state unless it embraced a two-state plan....

headline.main: Obama Makes His Mark as First 'Social Media' President
headline.print_headline: Obama Makes His Mark as First 'Social Media' President

docs.lead_paragraph: When President Barack Obama urged fellow leaders at the United Nations to do more for the world's refugees, his mention of a young boy named Alex could have been just a footnote, unnoticed or quickly forgotten.
docs.snippet: When President Barack Obama urged fellow leaders at the United Nations to do more for the world's refugees, his mention of a young boy named Alex could have been just a footnote, unnoticed or quickly forgotten....

headline.main: Obama Admin Blocks Seismic Surveys in Atlantic Ocean
headline.print_headline: Obama Admin Blocks Seismic Surveys in Atlantic Ocean

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Friday rejected requests by energy companies to conduct seismic surveys in the Atlantic Ocean to map potential drilling sites for oil and natural gas.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration on Friday rejected requests by energy companies to conduct seismic surveys in the Atlantic Ocean to map potential drilling sites for oil and natural gas....
